column4: Hm. I just installed Ubuntu 6.10 on my computer. It has a Promise FastTrak RAID controller, which stripes two drives together to make one big one. On Windows this is properly recognized, but on Linux it still recognizes it as two drives. No big deal, I thought, and deleted the array before installing Ubuntu.
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FakeRaidHowto  I havent done it myself but Ive seen other people get it going using this guide
